bind.relevant: (../../current_visit_type/value = '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' or ../../current_visit_type/value = '7035^SECOND DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT ^99DCT') and (../../systolic_blood_pressure/value > 100 and ../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 140) and (../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value > 50 and ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 90) and not(selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'enalapril') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'hctz') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'losartan') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'nifedipine')) and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'edema_legs') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'shortness_of_breath_with_exertion') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'oliguria') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'focal_weakness'))

../../current_visit_type/value = '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' and ((../../systolic_blood_pressure/value >= 140 and ../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 180) or (../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value >= 90 and ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 110)) and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and /form/patient/tmp/age_in_years >= 35 and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'edema_legs') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'shortness_of_breath_with_exertion') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'oliguria') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'focal_weakness')) and (../../serum_glucose_fasting/value >= 5.6 or ../../glycosylated_hemoglobin/value >= 5.7)

((../../systolic_blood_pressure/value >= 100 and ../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 180) or (../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value >= 50 and ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 110)) and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and (selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'edema_legs') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'shortness_of_breath_with_exertion') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'oliguria') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'focal_weakness'))

../../current_visit_type/value != '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' and ../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 140 and ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 90 and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and ../../../patient/tmp/age_in_years >= 35 and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'edema_legs') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'shortness_of_breath_with_exertion') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'oliguria') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'focal_weakness')) and (selected(/form/obs/tmp_drugs, 'hctz ') and /form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/number_of_milligram/value = 25.0 and (selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1639^MORNING^99DCT') or selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1730^EVENING^99DCT') or selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1891^ONCE A DAY^99DCT') ) )

../../current_visit_type/value = '7036^RETURN DISPENSARY VISIT^99DCT' and ((../../systolic_blood_pressure/value >= 140 and ../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 180) or (../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value >= 90 and ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 110)) and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and ../../../patient/tmp/age_in_years >= 35 and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'edema_legs') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'shortness_of_breath_with_exertion') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'oliguria') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'focal_weakness')) and (selected(/form/obs/tmp_drugs, 'hctz ') and /form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/number_of_milligram/value = 25.0 and (selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1639^MORNING^99DCT') or selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1730^EVENING^99DCT') or selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment_3/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1891^ONCE A DAY^99DCT') ) )

(../../current_visit_type/value = '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' or ../../current_visit_type/value = '7035^SECOND DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT ^99DCT') and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and not(selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'metformin') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'glibenclamide')) and (../../serum_glucose_fasting/value < 5.6 or ../../glycosylated_hemoglobin/value < 5.7)

(../../current_visit_type/value = '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' or ../../current_visit_type/value = '7035^SECOND DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT ^99DCT') and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and not(selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'metformin') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'glibenclamide')) and ((../../serum_glucose_fasting/value >= 5.6 and ../../serum_glucose_fasting/value <= 6.9) or (../../glycosylated_hemoglobin/value >= 5.7 and ../../glycosylated_hemoglobin/value <= 7.0)) and (../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 140 or ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 90)

(../../current_visit_type/value = '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' or ../../current_visit_type/value = '7035^SECOND DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT ^99DCT') and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and not(selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'metformin') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'glibenclamide')) and ((../../serum_glucose_fasting/value > 6.9 and ../../serum_glucose_fasting/value <= 10.0) or (../../glycosylated_hemoglobin/value > 7.0 and ../../glycosylated_hemoglobin/value <= 9.0)) and (../../systolic_blood_pressure/value < 140 or ../../diastolic_blood_pressure/value < 90)

(../../current_visit_type/value = '7034^FIRST DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT^99DCT' or ../../current_visit_type/value = '7035^SECOND DISPENSARY VISIT AFTER HCT ^99DCT') and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and not(selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'metformin') or selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'glibenclamide')) and (../../serum_glucose_fasting/value > 10.0 or ../../glycosylated_hemoglobin/value > 9.0)

selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'metformin') and (selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'nausea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'vomiting') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'abdominal_pain') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'diarrhea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'constipation'))

../../current_visit_type/value = '7036^RETURN DISPENSARY VISIT^99DCT' and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and ../../serum_glucose_fasting/value >= 8.0 and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'nausea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'abdominal_pain') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'diarrhea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'constipation')) and (selected(/form/obs/tmp_drugs, 'metformin') and /form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment/number_of_milligram/value = 500.0 and (selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1888^TWICE A DAY^99DCT') ) )

../../current_visit_type/value = '7036^RETURN DISPENSARY VISIT^99DCT' and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and ../../serum_glucose_fasting/value >= 8.0 and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'nausea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'abdominal_pain') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'diarrhea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'constipation')) and (selected(/form/obs/tmp_drugs, 'metformin') and /form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment/number_of_milligram/value = 750.0 and (selected(/form/obs/patient_reported_current_other_treatment/medication_frequency_per_day/value, '1888^TWICE A DAY^99DCT') ) )

../../current_visit_type/value = '7036^RETURN DISPENSARY VISIT^99DCT' and ../../urine_pregnancy_test_qualitative/value != '703^POSITIVE^99DCT' and ../../serum_glucose_fasting/value >= 8.0 and selected(../../tmp_drugs, 'metformin') and ../../patient_reported_current_other_treatment/number_of_milligram/value = 1000 and not(selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'nausea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'vomiting') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'abdominal_pain') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'diarrhea') or selected(../../review_of_systems_general/xforms_value, 'constipation'))

select1.label: Visit Type
select1.hint: What is the the current visit type?

input.label: Systolic Blood Pressure from pHCT Screening card
Diastolic Blood Pressure from pHCT Screening card
Fasting Blood Sugar (FBS) from pHCT Screening card
input.hint: Blood glucose is measured on a fasting basis (collected after an 8 to 10 hour fast).

input.label: Random Blood Sugar (RBS) from pHCT Screening card
input.hint: Laboratory measurement of the glucose level in the blood.

select.label: Your current medications
select.hint: Select all medications the patient is currently taking

select.label: Specify the reason for missing some of your [Metformin] doses
Specify the reason for missing some of your [Glibenclamide] doses
Specify the reason for missing some of your [Enalapril] doses
Specify the reason for missing some of your [HCTZ] doses
Specify the reason for missing some of your [Losartan] doses
Specify the reason for missing some of your [Nifedipine] doses
Do you have any of the following symptoms
select.hint: Make sure you ask about each symptom. Mark all whose answer is yes

item.label: Weakness in one part of the body

select1.label: How long ago was the first day of your menstrual period?
Urine Pregnancy Test
select1.hint: Test that determines pregnancy status through measure of hormone content in urine.

input.label: Good BP. Advise on Salt reduction, Weight reduction if BMI >30, Exercise, Smoking cessation and Alcohol reduction (if applicable). DISCHARGE HOME
Patient under 35 with elevated BP. Refer to CO/Health Center
Advise on Salt reduction, Weight reduction if BMI >30, Exercise, Smoking cessation and Alcohol reduction (if applicable); RETURN to DISPENSARY in 1 month
BP high on HTN meds. Advise on Salt reduction, Weight reduction if BMI >30, Exercise, Smoking cessation and Alcohol reduction (if applicable). REFER to CO/Clinic.
Patient with both elevated blood pressure and blood sugar. REFER to CO/Clinic.
BP is very high. Advise on Salt reduction, Weight reduction if BMI >30, Exercise, Smoking cessation and Alcohol reduction (if applicable). REFER to CO immediately.
REFER TO CO/ High Risk ANC
Start on HCTZ 25 mg a day. Advise on Salt reduction, Weight reduction if BMI >30, Exercise, Smoking cessation and Alcohol reduction (if applicable)
Patient with elevated blood pressure and elevated blood sugar. REFER to CO/Clinic.
Patient with Hypertension symptoms. REFER TO CO
BP good. Continue HCTZ 25mg a day. Advise on Salt reduction, Weight reduction if BMI >30, Exercise, Smoking cessation and Alcohol reduction (if applicable). RETURN TO DISPENSARY in 4 months

BP elevated. If today is 3rd successive monthly return visit while on HCTZ 25mg a day, REFER Pt to CO. Otherwise continue HCTZ 25mg a day, and monitor monthly. Advise on Salt reduction, Weight reduction if BMI >30, Exercise, Smoking cessation and Alcohol reduction (if applicable)
BP low. REFER patient to CO/Health Center
NORMAL blood sugar, educate on prevention. DISCHARGE or follow-up after a year as needed
Pregnant with Diabetes. Refer to High Risk ANC Clinic
Borderline high Blood sugar. Educate on lifestyle modification, review after 6 months
Diabetes CONFIRMED Start Metformin 500mg twice a day (BD). Return to Dispensary in 2 weeks
Blood sugar is very high. REFER TO CO immediately. Educate on lifestyle modification
Patient has [symptom], [symptom] on Metformin. Likely side effect. Refer to CO immediately
Patient has likely hypoglycemia on Glibenclamide. Refer to CO immediately
Suboptimal Blood sugar control. Consider increasing Metformin up to 750 mg twice a day (BD). Return to Dispensary after 2 weeks. Educate on lifestyle modification
Suboptimal Blood sugar control. Consider increasing Metformin up to 1000 mg (1 gram) twice a day (BD). Return to Dispensary after 2 weeks. Educate on lifestyle modification
Suboptimal BS control on 1000 mg (1 gram) metformin. REFER to CO immediately
For Medications Prescribed, if there are different doses for the medication for different times of day, you should enter each as a separate prescription using the Add Group feature.

select.label: Medications Prescribed
select.hint: Select all medications prescriped during this visit

input.label: Prescribed [Metformin] dose in milligrams (mg)
input.hint: [Metformin] was not previously prescribed or you are changing the dosage from the previous (mg). If this is not the case, Swipe back to correct the error.

select.label: REFERRALS ORDERED
select.hint: Select all referrals made during this visit

input.label: Return Date to Dispensary
input.hint: Patient is to return on this date
